data_table.description: Informed Consent Tracking Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ICTA1
variable.description: [Informed consent]. Type of consent. Q1 [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA2A
variable.description: [Informed consent]. Restrictions on use/storage of DNA? Q2a [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA2B
variable.description: [Informed consent]. Type of restriction on use/storage of DNA. Q2b [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA3A
variable.description: [Informed consent]. Other restrictions placed on procedures or use of study data? Q3a [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA3B
variable.description: [Informed consent]. Type of restrictions on procedures or use of study data. Q3b [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA4A
variable.description: [Informed consent]. Restrictions on release of results to participant's physician? Q4a [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA4B
variable.description: [Informed consent]. Type of restriction placed on releasing ARIC results to the participant's physician. Q4b [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA5
variable.description: [Informed consent]. Permission to access medical records? Q5 [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA9A
variable.description: [Post-visit consent modification]. Consent changed? Q9a [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA10A
variable.description: [Post-visit consent modification]. Restrictions on use/storage of DNA? Q10a [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA10B
variable.description: [Post-visit consent modification]. Type of restriction on use/storage of DNA? Q10b [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA11A
variable.description: [Post-visit consent modification]. Other restrictions placed on procedures or use of study data? Q11a [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA11B
variable.description: [Post-visit consent modification]. Type of restriction on procedures or use of study data. Q11b [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA12
variable.description: [Post-visit consent modification]. Permission to access medical records? Q12 [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA13A
variable.description: [Post-visit consent modification]. Withdrawal from study? Q13a [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTAFLAG
variable.description: 1= Informed Consent Tracking Form [ICTA] form is present [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTACY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Informed Consent Tracking Form, exam 4]

variable.name: ICTA13BDAYS
variable.description: Days of withdrawal request since exam 1
